justification: “Specifically, we selected Sociability from Extraversion …” among the 100 items drawn from the Comprehensive Personality Scale to represent this construct.
The authors state that they “selected … Cooperation from Agreeableness” as one of the facets measured with items taken from the Comprehensive Personality Scale.
In describing the measure they note the inclusion of “Industriousness from Conscientiousness,” indicating this construct is operationalized with CPS items.
The Methods section lists “Well-being from Emotional Stability” as one of the five facets assessed using the Comprehensive Personality Scale items.
They report that “Curiosity from Openness” was among the selected facets, measured through the Comprehensive Personality Scale.
